text: 1.20 Lom 5.5, 8.19, Epe 6.19-20, 1 Pi 4.16 Anɨb ak tek, gos awl yad ak, tap olap gɨ tɨmel gɨl tek nebeŋ ma dɨnɨgayn tek lup. Mel yɨbɨl. Mɨñɨl abe kɨdek abe, kɨles tɨmel gɨl wog teplep nep gɨnɨgayn agɨl gos nepin. Anɨb ak yad mɨnek mɨnek gɨtep gɨpin. Pen yad kumnɨgayn akaŋ, koŋɨm yenɨgayn ak, tap yad gɨnɨgayn okok mɨdupsek Klays nop yɨb awl ñɨnɨgayn.
